Notes: One of the game's main collectibles. There are two variants: Coins (Coin) and Purple Coins (PurpleCoin). Normal Coins can restore one health point if collected by the player. Purple Coins do not restore health, though. Purple Coins can only be used in Purple Comet scenarios or appropriately configured Scenario files. Normal Coins won't appear during Daredevil (Dark) Comets. Both variants can be collected by the Orange Luma in SMG2. If they are stored inside a bubble, they will also restore the player's air when underwater. Coins will spin slower when placed underwater.

Obj_arg3.Name: Shadow Calculation
Obj_arg3.Description: If set, the shadow will be calculated at all times and the game takes the shadow range into account when clipping.

Obj_arg4.Name: Pose Type
Obj_arg4.Description: Defines how to to position and rotate the Coin. May also connect the Coin to the collision below in SMG2.

Values.Notes: Rotation & shadow direction affected by gravity
Rotation ignores gravity & shadow direction affected by gravity
Attach to Collision below & shadow direction not affected by gravity (SMG2)

Obj_arg7.Name: Inside Bubble?
Obj_arg7.Description: If true, the Coin will be placed inside an Air Bubble.

SW_B.Description: Kills the Coin if this switch gets activated.
